mapper.select: select * from costflow c left join oldman o on c.om_id = o.om_id where c.om_id=#{omid} and c.cos_category='交费' order by c.cos_date desc

select cos_id, cos_category, cos_money, cos_date, cos_explain, cos_remarks, o.om_id, o.tom_name, o.tom_number, o.tom_card, u.uid, u.uname from costflow c inner join oldman o on c.om_id = o.om_id inner join user u on c.uid = u.uid order by cos_date desc

select cos_id, cos_category, cos_money, cos_date, cos_explain, cos_remarks, o.om_id, o.tom_name, o.tom_number, o.tom_card, u.uid, u.uname from costflow c inner join oldman o on c.om_id = o.om_id inner join user u on c.uid = u.uid where c.om_id = #{omid} and c.cos_explain = #{type} order by cos_date desc
